segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink pouring water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing right there, drying dishes like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, and she could slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's damaging the cabinets, streaming down the doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor kids are up to mischief with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that unstable stool, stretching way up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll fall and get hurt for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, not even helping to steady it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's completely unaware of all this chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter, ready to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone involved.
segments.speaker: PAR
